segments.text: Sir , may I please see your license and registration ? Do you know how fast you were going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm not sure . I think about 65 mph , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're not sure ? You were going at 90 miles per hour ! That's 25 mph over the legal speed limit ! Have you been drinking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then how can you explain your behavior ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess I just wasn't paying attention to the speedometer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not paying attention to the speedometer ? Why not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um , because I was busy talking to my friend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I was using a cell phone . I just bought it , so I decided to give my friend a phone call to tell him about it . While I did that I also turned on the radio and was listening to one of my favorite songs , and eating some food I had bought at a fast food restaurant , and , um ... guess I had too many distractions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's definitely true . I'm going to have to give you a ticket . Please remember to drive more carefully next time .
segments.speaker: S1
